nodes.text: Star's Delight was a Gymsnor-3 light freighter owned by weapon trader Lai Nootka. In 6 ABY, Nootka was captured by Prefect Mosh Barris for attempting to sell X-wing spare parts and proton torpedoes, keeping the Star's Delight grounded on Garqi. With some help by Corran Horn, Nootka and his crew eventually escaped from Garqi.
